trans-unit.source: Represents white space in element content.
trans-unit.target: Representa o espaço em branco no conteúdo do elemento.

trans-unit.source: This class is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWhitespace"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWhitespace"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo construtores de classes derivadas para inicializar o estado deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The white space characters of the node.
trans-unit.target: Os carateres de espaço em branco do nó.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Cria um duplicado deste nó.

trans-unit.source: CloneNode serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: CloneNode serve como um construtor de cópia para nós.

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para ver como este método se comporta com outros tipos de nó, consulte <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O nó clonado não tem um principal.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>Devolve `null`.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para recursivamente clonar subárvore sob o nó especificado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para clonar apenas o próprio nó.

trans-unit.source: For white space nodes, the cloned node always includes the data value, regardless of the parameter setting.
trans-unit.target: Para os nós de espaço em branco, o nó clonado inclui sempre o valor de dados, independentemente da definição do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: O nó clonado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do local do nó.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWhitespace" name="XmlWhitespace" href=""></xref> nodes, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_#whitespace" name="#whitespace" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWhitespace" name="XmlWhitespace" href=""> </xref> nós, esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_#whitespace" name="#whitespace" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome qualificado do nó.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWhitespace" name="XmlWhitespace" href=""></xref> nodes, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_#whitespace" name="#whitespace" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWhitespace" name="XmlWhitespace" href=""> </xref> nós, esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_#whitespace" name="#whitespace" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de nó.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWhitespace" name="XmlWhitespace" href=""></xref> nodes, the value is <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWhitespace" name="XmlWhitespace" href=""> </xref> nós, o valor é <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> nó principal do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text node that immediately precedes this node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó de texto que precede imediatamente neste nó.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do nó.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, valid white space characters must be specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade, carateres de espaços em branco válido devem ser especificados.

trans-unit.source: White space can consist of one or more space characters, carriage returns, line feeds, or tabs.
trans-unit.target: Espaço em branco pode ser composto por um ou mais carateres de espaço, mudanças, avanços de linha ou separadores.

trans-unit.source: The white space characters found in the node.
trans-unit.target: Os carateres de espaço em branco encontrados no nó.

trans-unit.source: Setting Value to invalid white space characters.
trans-unit.target: Valor de definição de carateres de espaços em branco inválido.

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda todos os elementos subordinados do nó especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>ao qual pretende guardar.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o nó especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>ao qual pretende guardar.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>
